SEARCH
Package com.bteam.fantasychess_client.utils

Class TileMathService

java.lang.Object
com.bteam.fantasychess_client.utils.TileMathService
public class TileMathService extends Object
Mathematical Functions for Grid

Offers methods for easy coordinate transformation between world and grid coordinates.

  • Constructor Details

    • TileMathService

      public TileMathService(int mapWidth, int mapHeight, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap tiledMap, int tilePixelWidth, int tilePixelHeight)
      Create a new Service for a map.

      Corners are calculated for the grid based on center, map and tile sizes.

      Parameters:
      mapWidth - Width of grid in tiles
      mapHeight - Height of grid in tiles
      tiledMap - The center in world coordinates
      tilePixelWidth - the width of a tile in pixel
      tilePixelHeight - the height of a tile in pixel

  • Method Details

    • gridToWorld

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 gridToWorld(int row, int col)
      Get the position of the center of a tile.

      Works by creating two lines on the outer edges of the columns, moving col * the width of a tile on it and then doing the same for row between both points.

      Parameters:
      row - the row on the grid starting at 0
      col - the column on the grid starting at 0
      Returns:
      The position in world coordinates

    • gridToTiled

      public com.bteam.common.models.Vector2D gridToTiled(com.bteam.common.models.Vector2D grid)
      Transforms grid coordinates into tiled map coordinates
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid coordinates
      Returns:
      the tiled map coordinates

    • worldToGrid

      public com.bteam.common.models.Vector2D worldToGrid(float x, float y)
      Get the center of the nearest tile from 2 world coordinates.

      Projects the coordinates given onto the edges of the grid. Then, the percentage of the projected lines is calculated using the column size (TileUnits) to get the nearest tile.

      Parameters:
      x - the x world coordinate
      y - the y world coordinate
      Returns:
      Vector2D containing rows and columns on the grid, or null if percent not within 0-100.

    • lineIntersection

      public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 lineIntersection(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pointVector1, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 directionVector1, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pointVector2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 directionVector2)
      Find the intersection between two lines.
      Parameters:
      pointVector1 - The point vector of the first line
      directionVector1 - The direction vector of the first line
      pointVector2 - The point vector of the second line
      directionVector2 - The direction vector of the second line
      Returns:
      The coordinates of the intersection, or null, if non-existent

    • percentOnLine

      public float percentOnLine(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 point, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 startPoint, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 endPoint)
      Calculate the percentage of a point on a line.

      Percentage of the point on the line capped between 0.0 and 1.0. The point needs to be on the line.

      Parameters:
      point - a point on the line
      startPoint - the starting point
      endPoint - the end point
      Returns:
      Percentage of the distance between the points

      Parameters:

      Returns:
